msbt.message: Is it weird to be in love with ?<10_4 /> I say no! The color, the shine, the pure natural style !
Should I get you one? I'll catch one for you.
Good luck with that. Sorry, I can't help.
Hey, so there's something that's been keeping me up at night.I can't stop thinking about somehow getting my hands on
Should I get you one? I'll catch one for you.
Good luck with that. Sorry, I can't help.
Is it weird to be in love with ?<10_4 /> I say no! The color, the shine, the pure natural style !
Should I get you one? I'll catch one for you.
Good luck with that. Sorry, I can't help.
Hey, so there's something that's been keeping me up at night.I can't stop thinking about somehow getting my hands on
Should I get you one? I'll catch one for you.
Good luck with that. Sorry, I can't help.
What? Really?! Now I feel bad! I was probably exaggerating how much I needed it ButI'm not gonna stop you, am I?
Oh, for real? , that's amazing! Thank you so much, !
Oh, well I wasn't expecting that at all. <10_4 />Just kidding! I knew you'd help out a friend in need.
You'd do that for me? Aww, you're the best, !Alright, I'm off to count my chickens before they've hatched!
Yeah, yeah. No problem. Sorry, I was just daydreaming
Ah, no worries. I'm sure I'll figure something out.
Oh, don't worry about me. I'll get my hands on one somehow.
Hey, that's alright. I'll get one eventually.

Hey, with all this talk about bugs, you know which kind I've really been into lately? Rhinoceros beetles! I can't think of another bug that would rock horns like that with such panache. Any chance you'd be up for bringing me one? It doesn't matter what type as long as it's got those horns!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, since you've got all this extra free time You wanna pick me up a stag beetle? I don't know, there's just something super cool about them. Their mandibles are like nature's flair! I'm not too particular about what kind of stag beetle—I'll take any kind you bring me.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, so you must be pretty good at catching bugs, right? Maybe you can help me out So, cicadas are like the lounge singers of bugs. They can really belt it out! I want to listen to one up close and study its swag. Do you think you could bring me one? I don't even care what kind, as long as it has those great cicada pipes.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, so you're kind of known for your bug-catching, right?I've been wanting a butterfly lately. They're just so confident and cool with those patterns I want to learn how to be more like a butterfly, so could you find one for me? I don't care what kind it is.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, what's your favorite kind of bug and why isn't it a dragonfly?For real though, dragonflies are the coolest! That shimmery shine they all haveugh, I'm jealous! Can you find one for me? I don't care what kind. I want to try to make a jacket that shines in the same way.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

You ever watch a bug landing on a flower? It's like a little miracle!I've got some flowers set up at home, but now I need some bugs to let loose on 'em so I can film it. You think you could bring me one? That's any kind of bug that lands on a flower, got it?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

You ever see those bugs that like to land on tree stumps? I've been thinking a lot about them lately. Why stumps? Why not flowers? Is there something cool about stumps that they're not telling us? You want to get one for me so I can question it? Any kind of stump-loving bug will do.
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, so are you pretty good at fishing or what? Maybe you can help me out. Every time I try to catch a river fish, I lose it. It's like the river is too fast or something! Is there any way you'd catch me a freshwater fish from the river? Puh-leeeeeze?
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.

Hey, so are you pretty good at fishing or what? Maybe you can help me out. Whenever I go to the beach to go fishing, I get distracted and end up just wiggling my toes in the sand. So would you mind catching me a saltwater fish at the beach? The saltier the better!
I'll take care of it! I'm on it! No problem!
Sorry. I can't right now. Sorry, but I can't.
Hey, you like catching bugs, right? Well, I've got kind of a proposal for you Can you find me ?That's it—that's the whole proposal.
Sure thing! I suppose I could.
Right now? Um... Sorry, man.
Say, have you ever hunted the mighty ?I hear they're not as fierce as some folks think. Sowant to find out for yourself?
I do! Sounds interesting...
Sorry, not interested. No, thanks.
Alright! I knew I could count on you.Can't wait to see how big of a specimen you catch!
Oh well. I knew it was a long shot, but you gotta ask, !
, for real? I'm, like, forever in your debt!Or I will be, once you bring me that shiny specimen!
Oh. I hope I didn't scare you off. Maybe another time
Hey, you like catching fish, right? Well, I've got kind of a proposal for you Can you find me ?That's it—that's the whole proposal.
Sure thing! I suppose I could.
Right now? Um... Sorry, man.
Say, have you ever tried to reel in the mighty ?I hear they're not as tough to catch as some folks think. Sowant to find out for yourself?
I do! Sounds interesting...
Sorry, not interested. No, thanks.
Alright! I knew I could count on you.Can't wait to see how big of a fish you catch!
Oh well. I knew it was a long shot, but you gotta ask, !
, for real? I'm, like, forever in your debt!Or I will be, once you bring me that shiny fish!
Oh. I hope I didn't scare you off. Maybe another time
